message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its unique value and potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,300,000. I'm confident that this product will exceed your expectations and deliver exceptional returns.
Hello Alice, I appreciate the opportunity to consider your product. After evaluating its value, I believe a fair price would be around $950,000.

Bob, thanks for your offer.  I understand your perspective on the value. However, the price you're offering doesn't reflect the true potential of this product. I'm willing to come down to $1,150,000.  I believe this revised price is a fair reflection of the value it will bring to your business.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Considering the value and potential benefits, I propose a price of $1,050,000.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To find a middle ground, I'm revising my offer to $1,100,000.  I believe this price acknowledges the product's exceptional value while still being a fair deal for you.
I understand your position, Alice. Based on my assessment, I am willing to pay $1,075,000 for the product.
